data.title: In which year Rudyard Kipling was awarded a Nobel Prize in Literature?
data.meta_description: 1907 Rudyard Kipling was awarded a Nobel Prize in Literature in 1907 for the power of observation originality of imagination as a author
data.text:
Q. In which year Rudyard Kipling was awarded a Nobel Prize in Literature?

Answer: 1907

Notes: Rudyard Kipling was awarded a Nobel Prize in Literature in 1907 for the "power of observation, originality of imagination" as a author.

3
